article.Heading: Automakers send GST note to Finance Ministry
article.Summary: The auto industry has sent a detailed note to Finance Ministry on goods and services tax (GST) seeking that the government honours its 'promise' on excise exemptions granted by them.
article.Body:
The auto industry has sent a detailed note to Finance Ministry on goods and services tax (GST) seeking that the government honours its 'promise' on excise exemptions granted by them.

Watch accompanying video of CNBC-TV18â€™s Ronojoy Banerjee for more details.
